name: Change Event Pusher
description:
Sends the JSON of the current page to the HTTP/WebSocket endpoint of your choosing, everytime your document changes! Dead simple and nimble.

When the plugin is opened and marked "Active", the plugin will watch for any changes in the current page. If there is a change detected, it will send a HTTP/WebSocket request to your chosen endpoint. 

The plugin by itself is not useful, unless you have something that want to receive HTTP/WebSocket requests for every change in the current Figma document.
